Java Class Documentation for pcp

pcp is a program for translating a subset of Java to C++.

See:
          Description

Packages
pcp The main pcp program.
pcp.translator pcp's classes for parsing the xtc abstract syntax tree.

 

pcp is a program for translating a subset of Java to C++.

So powerful, you'll think you're hallucinating.TM
